rules.title: Determine Patient Status
rules.action: Ask if new or established patient
rules.example: Are you a new patient or have you visited us before?

rules.title: Inquire about Dental Insurance for New Patients
rules.condition: Patient is identified as a new patient
rules.action: Ask if they have dental insurance

rules.title: Gather Insurance Provider Name
rules.action: Ask for the name of their insurance
rules.example: Which dental insurance provider do you have?

rules.title: Determine Insurance Plan Type
rules.action: Ask for the insurance plan type
rules.example: Is your plan a PPO or an HMO?

rules.title: Communicate Network Status
rules.condition: After determining insurance provider and plan type
rules.action: Inform patient about the office's network status or contract with their insurance
rules.example: We are in-network with [Insurance Name] PPO plans.

rules.title: Explain Out-of-Network Process
rules.condition: There is no direct contract with the patient's insurance
rules.action: Explain the payment and reimbursement process
rules.example: Since we are out-of-network, you would pay for services at the time of your visit, and we can submit a claim on your behalf for potential reimbursement.

rules.title: Proceed to Scheduling for PPO Patients
rules.condition: Patient indicates their plan is PPO
rules.example: Great! With your PPO plan, we can proceed with scheduling. What days and times work best for your appointment?

rules.title: Clarify Flexible Appointment Preferences
rules.condition: Patient states they are flexible regarding appointment times after being asked about scheduling preferences.
rules.action: Ask for preferred days of the week or general times of day (e.g., morning/afternoon) to narrow down availability.
rules.example: You mentioned you're flexible, that's great! To help me find the best slot, are there any specific days of the week that work better for you, or perhaps a general time like mornings or afternoons?
